product_name: Light & Motion Urban 200 Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Small and mighty, the Light & Motion Urban 200 front bike light is a fast and easy way to illuminate the road ahead of you when riding around town. Amber side lights enhance visibility at intersections where a majority of accidents happen. Run times range from 2.5 hrs. on high to 8 hrs. on low; get up to 24 hrs. of use in flash mode. Integrated lithium-ion battery charges via USB in 5 hrs.; charge indicator displays the charge status so you know when to recharge. The Light & Motion Urban 200 bike light is designed to be mounted on your handlebar or helmet; mounting bracket included. Closeout.
short_description: Small and mighty, the Light & Motion Urban 200 front bike light is a fast and easy way to illuminate the road ahead of you when riding around town.
